description:
Cute, young, hot and blond describes Leah Luv perfectly. Being one of today's hottest porn stars, you would have thought that someone, somewhere, at some point along the line would have tied her up. Alas, this is not the case. Not only had she never been tied up, she had never had the slightest interest in being bound.
Why she decided to work for Hogtied, I'll never know. What I do know is that we made a believer out of a skeptic. You have to watch the beginning interview and the ending interview, as the transition between the two is truly something to behold. The shoot itself was a back-to-basics shoot, after all, how do you really proceed with a girl who thinks she hates bondage? One way is to tie her to a chair and make her (without cuts). Over and over and over and over...
title: Leah Luv
